title: Divya Kanakaratna Jhumkas - Exquisite Gold and Ruby Bell Earrings
materials: Faceted Ruby/Ratna (approximately 1 carat each). Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design with intricate filigree work adorned with shimmering CZ stones. The top showcases a delicate flower motif with a vibrant ruby center. Finished with traditional dangling gold beads (gundlu) for a melodic sway. The setting style is a pav√© setting to highlight the cz stones.
colors: Predominantly gold with striking ruby red accents and dazzling white CZ stones.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
and traditional South Indian ceremonies such as muhurtham
and half-saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of ethnic elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: These Jhumkas embody the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the piece seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with modern brilliance. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The ruby accent adds a touch of regal sophistication. A timeless design to be treasured for generations. The CZ stones offer a diamond-like shine at an accessible price point.
